original_text: The wicked have drawn out the sword, and have bent their bow, to cast down the poor and needy, and to slay such as be of upright conversation.
korean_text: 악인이 칼을 빼고 활을 당겨 가난하고 궁핍한 자를 엎드러뜨리며 행위가 정직한 자를 죽이고자 하나

sentences.original_text: The wicked have drawn out the sword
to cast down the poor and needy
and to slay such as be of upright conversation
sentences.korean_translation: 정직한 행실을 하는 자를 죽이려고 합니다
